body.raw:
{
  "areaId": "{{areaId}}",
  "developerId": "{{developerId}}",
  "communityId": "{{communityId}}",
  "images": [
    "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/image2.jpg"
  ],
  "name": "Luxury Marina Apartment",
  "overview": "A stunning 2-bedroom apartment with marina views and modern amenities",
  "status": "Ready_To_Move",
  "type": "Apartments",
  "isFeatured": true,
  "accommodation": "",
  "possession": "Ready",
  "size": 1200,
  "downPayment": 250000,
  "paymentPlanId": "{{paymentPlanId}}",
  "handover": "2024-12-31T00:00:00.000Z",
  "featureAmenitiesId": "{{featureAmenityId}}",
  "brochure": "https://example.com/brochure.pdf",
  "floorPlanBrochure": "https://example.com/floor-plan.pdf",
  "paymentPlanBrochure": "https://example.com/payment-plan.pdf",
  "price": 1500000
}

item.name: Get Property Contacts by Property ID

body.raw:
{
  "propertyId": "{{propertyId}}",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "phone": "+971501234567",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "type": "Individual",
  "message": "I am interested in this property and would like more information."
}

{
  "propertyId": "{{propertyId}}",
  "mode": "OFFLINE",
  "timeframe": "MORNING",
  "name": "Alice Johnson",
  "email": "alice.johnson@example.com",
  "message": "I would like to schedule a tour of this property this weekend."
}
